summary: While the biotechnology revolution presents opportunities for scientific breakthroughs, in the wrong hands these technologies could help create biological weapons with catastrophic impacts. How do we defend against these and other biological threats, including naturally-occurring diseases? We testified before a House committee on our work on the nation's long-standing biodefense challenges. We identified key challenges in the nation's ability to detect and respond to biological...
title: Biodefense: The Nation Faces Long-Standing Challenges Related to Defending Against Biological Threats
